amendment.description: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds for the implementation of parts of Executive Order 14019, titled "Executive Order on Promoting Access to Voting.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
